name: Dear Lighthouse
description:
You are a lighthouse keeper. Every day is practically the same - wake up, eat, water your plant, clean the lighthouse lens, dust your medals, check your mail, go to bed.
But that’s okay. Monotony means no one’s wrecking their ships.

Dear Lighthouse is a short contemplative game about isolation, monotony, and light. Best played with headphones. 

Programming, design and art by Kaelan Doyle Myerscough (Twitter, Instagram, Website).
Writing by Britt A Willis (Twitter, Instagram, Website).
Sound by Andrew Tran (Twitter, Website).
Font "Reading Machine" by Andrew Colenbrander (Twitter, Itch).
